product_name: SkirtSports Wonder Girl Tank Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Perfect for the gym, summertime bike rides, tempo runs or just about any warm-weather activity, the SkirtSports Wonder Girl tank top meets your training needs with a fun, athletic sense of style. Fabric on upper portion of tank top features lightweight polyester with a touch of stretch for soft, breathable comfort; fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Lower portion features polyester mesh fabric for ultimate ventilation, keeping you cool and dry in warm weather. Lightweight, built-in mesh shelf bra provides support for cup sizes A - C; nylon mesh in bra wicks moisture away from skin for continuous performance. Shelf bra features internal pocket that stows keys, ID, media player or even a phone, keeping your essentials close. Racerback allows unrestricted motion. SkirtSports Wonder Girl tank top features shirring at neckline for a feminine touch. Closeout.
short_description: Perfect for the gym, summertime bike rides, tempo runs or just about any warm-weather activity, the SkirtSports Wonder Girl tank top meets your training needs with a fun, athletic sense of style.
